014package org.microbean.construct.type;
015
016import java.util.ArrayList;
017import java.util.Collection;
018import java.util.Collections;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Optional;
021
022import javax.lang.model.type.ArrayType;
023import javax.lang.model.type.DeclaredType;
024import javax.lang.model.type.ErrorType;
025import javax.lang.model.type.ExecutableType;
026import javax.lang.model.type.IntersectionType;
027import javax.lang.model.type.NoType;
028import javax.lang.model.type.NullType;
029import javax.lang.model.type.PrimitiveType;
030import javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind;
031import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
032import javax.lang.model.type.TypeVariable;
033import javax.lang.model.type.TypeVisitor;
034import javax.lang.model.type.UnionType;
035import javax.lang.model.type.WildcardType;
036
037import org.microbean.construct.UniversalConstruct;
038import org.microbean.construct.Domain;
039
040import org.microbean.construct.element.UniversalElement;
041
042import static javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind.NONE;
043import static javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind.VOID;
044
045/**
046 * A {@link TypeMirror} and {@link UniversalConstruct} implementation.
047 *
048 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
049 *
050 * @see TypeMirror#getKind()
051 *
052 * @see UniversalConstruct
053 */
054public final class UniversalType
055  extends UniversalConstruct<TypeMirror>
056  implements ArrayType,
057             ErrorType,
058             ExecutableType,
059             IntersectionType,
060             NoType,
061             NullType,
062             PrimitiveType,
063             TypeVariable,
064             UnionType,
065             WildcardType {
066
067  private volatile UniversalType erasure;
068
069  /**
070   * Creates a new {@link UniversalType}.
071   *
072   * @param delegate a {@link TypeMirror} to which operations will be delegated; must not be {@code null}
073   *
074   * @param domain a {@link Domain} from which the supplied {@code delegate} is presumed to have originated; must not be
075   * {@code null}
076   *
077   * @exception NullPointerException if either argument is {@code null}
078   *
079   * @see #delegate()
080   */
081  @SuppressWarnings("try")
082  public UniversalType(final TypeMirror delegate, final Domain domain) {
083    super(delegate, domain);
084  }
085
086  @Override // TypeMirror
087  public final <R, P> R accept(final TypeVisitor<R, P> v, final P p) {
088    return switch (this.getKind()) {
089    case ARRAY        -> v.visitArray(this, p);
090    case DECLARED     -> v.visitDeclared(this, p);
091    case ERROR        -> v.visitError(this, p);
092    case EXECUTABLE   -> v.visitExecutable(this, p);
093    case INTERSECTION -> v.visitIntersection(this, p);
094    case
095      MODULE,
096      NONE,
097      PACKAGE,
098      VOID            -> v.visitNoType(this, p);
099    case NULL         -> v.visitNull(this, p);
100    case
101      BOOLEAN,
102      BYTE,
103      CHAR,
104      DOUBLE,
105      FLOAT,
106      INT,
107      LONG,
108      SHORT           -> v.visitPrimitive(this, p);
109    case TYPEVAR      -> v.visitTypeVariable(this, p);
110    case UNION        -> v.visitUnion(this, p);
111    case WILDCARD     -> v.visitWildcard(this, p);
112    case OTHER        -> v.visitUnknown(this, p);
113    };
114  }
115
116  @Override // Various
117  public final UniversalElement asElement() {
118    return switch (this.getKind()) {
119    case DECLARED -> UniversalElement.of(((DeclaredType)this.delegate()).asElement(), this.domain());
120    case TYPEVAR  -> UniversalElement.of(((TypeVariable)this.delegate()).asElement(), this.domain());
121    default -> null;
122    };
123  }
124
125  /**
126   * Returns the <dfn>element type</dfn> of this {@link UniversalType} if it is an array type, or simply this {@link
127   * UniversalType} if it is not.
128   *
129   * @return the <dfn>element type</dfn> of this {@link UniversalType} if it is an array type, or this {@link
130   * UniversalType} if it is not; never {@code null}
131   */
132  public final UniversalType elementType() {
133    return this.elementType(this);
134  }
135
136  private final UniversalType elementType(final UniversalType t) {
137    return switch (t.getKind()) {
138    case ARRAY -> this.elementType(t.getComponentType());
139    default -> t;
140    };
141  }
142
143  /**
144   * Returns the <dfn>erasure</dfn> of this {@link UniversalType}.
145   *
146   * @return the erasure of this {@link UniversalType}; never {@code null}
147   *
148   * @spec https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se23/html/jls-4.html#jls-4.6 Java Language Specification, section
149   * 4.6
150   */
151  public final UniversalType erasure() {
152    UniversalType t = this.erasure; // volatile read
153    if (t == null) {
154      t = this.erasure = switch (this.getKind()) { // volatile write, read
155      case ARRAY, DECLARED, TYPEVAR -> this.wrap(this.domain().erasure(this));
156      default -> this;
157      };
158    }
159    return t;
160  }
161
162  /**
163   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link UniversalType} is declared by a {@linkplain
164   * UniversalElement#generic() generic declaration}.
165   *
166   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link UniversalType} is declared by a {@linkplain
167   * UniversalElement#generic() generic declaration}
168   *
169   * @see UniversalElement#generic()
170   *
171   * @spec https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se23/html/jls-8.html#jls-8.1.2 Java Language Specification, section
172   * 8.1.2
173   */
174  public final boolean generic() {
175    final UniversalElement e = this.asElement();
176    return e != null && e.generic();
177  }
178
179  @Override // UnionType
180  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getAlternatives() {
181    return switch (this.getKind()) {
182    case UNION -> this.wrap(((UnionType)this.delegate()).getAlternatives());
183    default -> List.of();
184    };
185  }
186
187  @Override // IntersectionType
188  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getBounds() {
189    return switch (this.getKind()) {
190    case INTERSECTION -> this.wrap(((IntersectionType)this.delegate()).getBounds());
191    default -> List.of();
192    };
193  }
194
195  @Override // ArrayType
196  public final UniversalType getComponentType() {
197    return switch (this.getKind()) {
198    case ARRAY -> this.wrap(((ArrayType)this.delegate()).getComponentType());
199    default -> this.wrap(this.domain().noType(NONE));
200    };
201  }
202
203  @Override // DeclaredType
204  public final UniversalType getEnclosingType() {
205    return switch(this.getKind()) {
206    case DECLARED -> this.wrap(((DeclaredType)this.delegate()).getEnclosingType());
207    default -> this.wrap(this.domain().noType(NONE));
208    };
209  }
210
211  @Override // WildcardType
212  public final UniversalType getExtendsBound() {
213    return switch (this.getKind()) {
214    case WILDCARD -> this.wrap(((WildcardType)this.delegate()).getExtendsBound());
215    default -> null;
216    };
217  }
218
219  @Override // TypeMirror
220  public final TypeKind getKind() {
221    return this.delegate().getKind();
222  }
223
224  @Override // TypeVariable
225  public final UniversalType getLowerBound() {
226    return switch (this.getKind()) {
227    case TYPEVAR -> this.wrap(((TypeVariable)this.delegate()).getLowerBound());
228    default -> this.wrap(this.domain().nullType()); // bottom (null) type, not NONE type
229    };
230  }
231
232  @Override // TypeVariable
233  public final UniversalType getUpperBound() {
234    return switch (this.getKind()) {
235    case TYPEVAR -> this.wrap(((TypeVariable)this.delegate()).getUpperBound());
236    default -> this.wrap(this.domain().javaLangObject().asType());
237    };
238  }
239
240  @Override // ExecutableType
241  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getParameterTypes() {
242    return switch (this.getKind()) {
243    case EXECUTABLE -> this.wrap(((ExecutableType)this.delegate()).getParameterTypes());
244    default -> List.of();
245    };
246  }
247
248  @Override // ExecutableType
249  public final UniversalType getReceiverType() {
250    return switch (this.getKind()) {
251    case EXECUTABLE -> this.wrap(((ExecutableType)this.delegate()).getReceiverType());
252    default -> this.wrap(this.domain().noType(NONE));
253    };
254  }
255
256  @Override // ExecutableType
257  public final UniversalType getReturnType() {
258    return switch (this.getKind()) {
259    case EXECUTABLE -> this.wrap(((ExecutableType)this.delegate()).getReturnType());
260    default -> this.wrap(this.domain().noType(VOID));
261    };
262  }
263
264  @Override // WildcardType
265  public final UniversalType getSuperBound() {
266    return switch (this.getKind()) {
267    case WILDCARD -> this.wrap(((WildcardType)this.delegate()).getSuperBound());
268    default -> null;
269    };
270  }
271
272  @Override // ExecutableType
273  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getThrownTypes() {
274    return switch (this.getKind()) {
275    case EXECUTABLE -> this.wrap(((ExecutableType)this.delegate()).getThrownTypes());
276    default -> List.of();
277    };
278  }
279
280  @Override // DeclaredType
281  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getTypeArguments() {
282    return switch (this.getKind()) {
283    case DECLARED -> this.wrap(((DeclaredType)this.delegate()).getTypeArguments());
284    default -> List.of();
285    };
286  }
287
288  @Override // ExecutableType
289  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getTypeVariables() {
290    return switch (this.getKind()) {
291    case EXECUTABLE -> this.wrap(((ExecutableType)this.delegate()).getTypeVariables());
292    default -> List.of();
293    };
294  }
295
296  @Override // TypeMirror
297  public final int hashCode() {
298    return this.delegate().hashCode();
299  }
300
301  /**
302   * A convenience method that returns {@code true} if and only if this is the type declared by the {@code
303   * java.lang.Object} class.
304   *
305   * @return {@code true} if and only if this is the type declared by the {@code java.lang.Object} class
306   *
307   * @see UniversalElement#javaLangObject()
308   */
309  public final boolean javaLangObject() {
310    return this.getKind() == TypeKind.DECLARED && this.asElement().javaLangObject();
311  }
312
313  /**
314   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link UniversalType} represents a <dfn>parameterized type</dfn>.
315   *
316   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link UniversalType} represents a parameterized type
317   *
318   * @spec https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se23/html/jls-4.html#jls-4.5 Java Language Specification, section
319   * 4.5
320   */
321  public final boolean parameterized() {
322    return this.getKind() == TypeKind.DECLARED && !this.getTypeArguments().isEmpty();
323  }
324
325  /**
326   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link UniversalType} represents the <dfn>raw</dfn> usage of either a
327   * {@linkplain #parameterized() parameterized} type or an array type whose {@linkplain #elementType() element type} is
328   * parameterized.
329   *
330   * @return {@code true} if this {@link UniversalType} is the raw usage of either a parameterized type or an array type
331   * whose element type is parameterized
332   *
333   * @spec https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se23/html/jls-4.html#jls-4.5 Java Language Specification, section
334   * 4.5
335   *
336   * @spec https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se23/html/jls-4.html#jls-4.8 Java Language Specification, section
337   * 4.8
338   */
339  public final boolean raw() {
340    return switch (this.getKind()) {
341    case ARRAY -> this.elementType().raw();
342    case DECLARED -> this.asElement().generic() && this.getTypeArguments().isEmpty();
343    default -> false;
344    };
345  }
346
347  /**
348   * Returns the {@link UniversalType} that is the <dfn>raw</dfn> usage of this {@link UniversalType}, if it is capable
349   * of having such a usage, <strong>or {@code null} if it is not</strong>.
350   *
351   * @return a {@link UniversalType} whose {@link #raw()} method is guaranteed to return {@code true}, or {@code null}
352   *
353   * @see #raw()
354   *
355   * @spec https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se23/html/jls-4.html#jls-4.8 Java Language Specification, section
356   * 4.8
357   */
358  public final UniversalType rawType() {
359    return switch (this.getKind()) {
360    case ARRAY -> this.elementType().rawType();
361    default -> this.parameterized() ? this.erasure() : null;
362    };
363  }
364
365  @Override // TypeMirror
366  public final boolean equals(final Object other) {
367    return this == other || switch (other) {
368    case null -> false;
369    case TypeMirror her -> this.domain().sameType(this, her);
370    default -> false;
371    };
372  }
373
374  private final List<? extends UniversalType> wrap(final Collection<? extends TypeMirror> ts) {
375    return of(ts, this.domain());
376  }
377
378  private final UniversalType wrap(final TypeMirror t) {
379    return of(t, this.domain());
380  }
381
382
383  /*
384   * Static methods.
385   */
386
387
388  /**
389   * Returns a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link List} of {@link UniversalType}s whose elements wrap the supplied
390   * {@link List}'s elements.
391   *
392   * @param ts a {@link Collection} of {@link TypeMirror}s; must not be {@code null}
393   *
394   * @param domain a {@link Domain}; must not be {@code null}
395   *
396   * @return a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link List} of {@link UniversalType}s
397   *
398   * @exception NullPointerException if either argument is {@code null}
399   */
400  public static final List<? extends UniversalType> of(final Collection<? extends TypeMirror> ts, final Domain domain) {
401    if (ts.isEmpty()) {
402      return List.of();
403    }
404    final List<UniversalType> newTs = new ArrayList<>(ts.size());
405    for (final TypeMirror t : ts) {
406      newTs.add(of(t, domain));
407    }
408    return Collections.unmodifiableList(newTs);
409  }
410
411  /**
412   * Returns a non-{@code null} {@link UniversalType} that is either the supplied {@link TypeMirror} (if it itself is
413   * {@code null} or is a {@link UniversalType}) or one that wraps it.
414   *
415   * @param t a {@link TypeMirror}; may be {@code null} in which case {@code null} will be returned
416   *
417   * @param domain a {@link Domain}; must not be {@code null}
418   *
419   * @return a {@link UniversalType}, or {@code null} (if {@code t} is {@code null})
420   *
421   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code domain} is {@code null}
422   *
423   * @see #UniversalType(TypeMirror, Domain)
424   */
425  public static final UniversalType of(final TypeMirror t, final Domain domain) {
426    return switch (t) {
427    case null -> null;
428    case UniversalType ut -> ut;
429    default -> new UniversalType(t, domain);
430    };
431  }
432
433}
